Literature.Title: Short cationic lipopeptides as effective antibacterial agents: Design, physicochemical properties and biological evaluation
Literature.Author: Azmi F, Elliott AG, Marasini N, Ramu S, Ziora Z, Kavanagh AM, Blaskovich MA, Cooper MA, Skwarczynski M, Toth I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=0.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=1.4-1.9µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 17(MIC=0.9µM),Staphylococcus aureus NRS 1(MIC=1.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=0.5-0.9µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 700677(MIC=0.9µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=0.2µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=0.3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>30µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=15µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=30µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=>30µM)
